product_name: Outdoor Research Wind Pro Hat - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Warm and close-fitting, the fleece Wind Pro Hat from Outdoor Research is an excellent choice for snowshoers and backcountry skiers heading out in the cold. Hard-faced polyester/spandex fleece is wind-resistant, water-repellent and highly breathable. Wicks moisture to keep your head dry. Double-layer earband adds extra warmth. The Wind Pro Hat from Outdoor Research stretches to fit varied head sizes and retains its shape. Closeout.
short_description: Warm and close-fitting, the fleece Wind Pro Hat from Outdoor Research is an excellent choice for snowshoers and backcountry skiers heading out in the cold.
